Package alice.tuprologx.ide

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Console  
    FileEditArea  
    FontDimensionHandler  
    IDE
    A common interface to an IDE.
    InformationToDisplayListener
    Listener for information to display in the console events
    InputField
    This interface is not public, since it is intended for internal use, and could be subject to several changes in future releases.
    TheoryEditArea
    An interface to an edit area for Prolog theories.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutFrame  
    Applet
    A class for serving tuProlog as an applet.
    ConsoleDialog  
    ConsoleManager  
    CUIConsole  
    DebugAreaFrame  
    EngineStatus  
    EngineThread  
    FileIDE  
    GenericFrame  
    GUILauncher
    The GUI launcher chooses the GUI to execute (the Java2 or .NET version) based on the version of the Java Platform tuProlog is executed on.
    History
    A repository for history of goals which resolution has been asked for.
    InformationToDisplayEvent
    This class represents events concerning information to display in the console.
    IOFileOperations
    A common interface to Input/Output file operations managers.
    JavaEditArea
    An edit area for the Java 2 platform.
    JavaIDE
    The tuProlog IDE to be run on a Java2 platform.
    JavaInputField
    An input field for the Java2 platform using Swing components.
    JavaIOManager
    A manager for Input/Output operations on the Java 2 platform.
    LibraryDialogFrame  
    LibraryManager
    A dynamic manager for tuProlog libraries.
